lead_paragraph: Almost a year into his new life in Germany, Syrian refugee Ammar Sahar is well on his way to realizing his dream of becoming a Bundesliga referee.

headline.print_headline: Refugee to Referee: Syrian Eyes Promotion to Bundesliga
headline.main: Refugee to Referee: Syrian Eyes Promotion to Bundesliga

snippet: Almost a year into his new life in Germany, Syrian refugee Ammar Sahar is well on his way to realizing his dream of becoming a Bundesliga referee....
